overview: The MBA program is designed for ambitious professionals looking to elevate their careers, gain cutting-edge business knowledge, and develop leadership skills that make a real impact in the global business landscape. At NIET, we offer a comprehensive curriculum, industry-driven, innovative, and experiential learning for the holistic development of management graduates. Postgraduates from NIET are highly desirable job candidates because they are self-directed, ethical, and effective contributors in their communities.
why_choose: Apply knowledge of management theories and practices to solve business problems.
Foster analytical and critical thinking abilities for data-based decision making.
Ability to develop value-based leadership ability.
Ability to understand, analyze and communicate global, economic, legal, and ethical aspects of business.

overview: The Working Professional in Mechanical Engineering for PG (M. Tech.) course offered by the School of Mechanical Engineering at Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology in Greater Noida is uniquely tailored to address the demands of Industry 4.0, the era characterized by the integration of advanced technologies into manufacturing and production processes. This program emphasizes cutting-edge topics such as automation, robotics, artificial intelligence, and cyber-physical systems, which are at the forefront of the Industry 4.0 revolution.
why_choose: To develop/apply knowledge of computing fundamentals, computing specialization, mathematics, and domain knowledge for solving real-world problems.

Identify formulated review research literature and analyze complex problems reaching substantial conclusions using first fundamental principles of mathematics, computing science, and relevant domain specific.

Ability to design and evaluate systems, components, or processes for complex computing problems that meet specified needs with appropriate consideration for public health and safety and cultural societal, and environmental considerations.
Use research-based knowledge and research methods including design of experiments, analysis and interpretation of data, and synthesis of the information to provide valid conclusions.

overview: Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology, An Autonomous Institute, coming up with the popular course among students of India - Bachelor of Computer Application 3 years course with high demand all over the IT sector. This program is one of the top choices in BCA colleges in Greater Noida, (Delhi NCR) for students seeking a strong foundation in computer applications. The program is streamlined to meet the challenges in the IT industry.

overview: MBA in Marketing and Finance is a dynamic and interdisciplinary program designed to develop expertise in two critical business domains. The program equips students with strategic decision-making skills, financial acumen, and marketing insights, preparing them for leadership roles in global organizations. It is ideal for aspiring professionals seeking versatility and adaptability in today’s competitive business environment.

properties.eligibility: Graduation in any discipline from a recognized university

why_choose: Apply knowledge of management theories and practices to solve real-world business problems.
Develop analytical and critical thinking skills for data-driven decision making.
Build strong leadership qualities and ethical business practices.
Gain the ability to analyze and communicate global, economic, legal, and ethical business issues.

overview: The MBA in Innovation, Entrepreneurship & Venture Development (MBA-IEV) is designed for future leaders and visionaries who aspire to build, scale, and sustain successful businesses. The program equips students with entrepreneurial thinking, innovation frameworks, and practical exposure to convert ideas into scalable ventures. Through a rigorous and application-oriented curriculum, students learn how to create, manage, and lead strong, enduring organizations in a dynamic business environment.

properties.eligibility: Graduation in any discipline from a recognized university

why_choose: Access to startup funding support and incubation ecosystem.
Hands-on learning through innovation and entrepreneurship laboratories.
Dedicated discussion rooms for ideation, mentoring, and collaboration.
Professional board room facilities for strategic planning and presentations.

overview: NIET offers a five-year Integrated BBA–MBA program approved by AICTE and AKTU, designed with a cutting-edge curriculum aligned to industry demands. The program focuses on developing globally ethical, intelligent, and culturally agile professionals ready to meet 21st-century business challenges. It prepares students to become business-ready managers and entrepreneurs with the ability to respond to complex and dynamic business environments through a unique learning experience and contemporary curriculum.

properties.eligibility: 10+2 or equivalent from a recognized board

why_choose: Apply management theories and practices to solve real-world business problems.
Develop analytical and critical thinking skills for data-driven decision making.
Build strong leadership capabilities with ethical and professional values.
Gain the ability to analyze and communicate global, economic, legal, and ethical business issues.
